title: Exquisite Navratna Inspired Diamond Haaram with Emerald Centerpiece
materials: Base Metal: Silver Alloy with Gold Plating. Gemstones: Cubic Zirconia
and Ruby Simulants. Features a high-shine
features: This Haaram features a contemporary take on the classic Navratna style. The geometric design is accented with shimmering cubic zirconia stones, and is focused on a central square cut emerald gemstone. The intricate open work filigree design showcases peacock elements with emerald and ruby accents, typical of South Indian Jewelry. Delicate pearl beads dangle along the lower edge for a touch of traditional elegance.
colors: Primary: Gold and White. Accent Colors: Emerald Green and Ruby Red.
occasions: and special occasions. Can also be paired with traditional South Indian attire for festivals and cultural events.
description: This exquisite haaram seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian design elements. The geometric detailing, along with traditional South Indian peacock motifs, creates a sophisticated look that is sure to turn heads. High-quality materials ensure both beauty and durability, making it a timeless addition to your jewelry collection.
